mapper.select: SELECT event_id, title, description, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, is_all_day, type, location, created_by, created_at, updated_at FROM event WHERE event_id = #{id}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO event ( title, description, start_date, end_date, start_time, end_time, is_all_day, type, location, created_by, created_at, updated_at ) VALUES ( #{title}, #{description}, #{startDate}, #{endDate}, #{startTime}, #{endTime}, #{isAllDay}, #{type}, #{location}, #{createdBy}, #{createdAt}, #{updatedAt} )
